price: 41. Tokkel baababa temeete waqdi firqawnak:diggah nanu galto linoo? nanu Muusak yayse mara nekkck itte.
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ قَالُواْ لِفِرۡعَوۡنَ أَئِنَّ لَنَا لَأَجۡرًا إِن كُنَّا نَحۡنُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: falammā jāa al-saḥaratu qālū lifir'ʿawna a-inna lanā la-ajran in kunnā naḥnu al-ghālibīna
